dmca.title: Legal Demand and DMCA Copyright Notice Re Vanessa Hudgens
dmca.body:
<<info@unconfirmedsources.com.pdf>>  
Sent on behalf of Adam Thurston, please see attached.

Tamara Halvorson
Assistant to Adam J. Thurston, Christopher F. Wong, & Elena S. Min
Eisenberg Raizman Thurston & Wong LLP
10880 Wilshire Blvd. | Eleventh Floor | Los Angeles, California  90024
direct: 310.445.4409 | fax: 310.445.4410 | thalvorson@ertwllp.com |
www.ertwllp.comhe message is ready to be sent with the following file or
link attachments:

info@unconfirmedsources.com


Note: To protect against computer viruses, e-mail programs may prevent
sending or receiving certain types of file attachments.  Check your
e-mail security settings to determine how attachments are handled.

This electronic message is from a law firm. It may contain confidential or privileged information. If you received this transmission in error, please reply to the sender to advise of the error and delete this transmission and any attachments.

IRS Circular 230 Disclosure: To ensure compliance with requirements imposed by the IRS, we inform you that any U.S. federal tax advice contained in this communication (including any attachments) is not intended or written to be used, and cannot be used, for the purpose of (i) avoiding penalties under the Internal Revenue Code or (ii) promoting, marketing, or recommending to another party any transaction or matter addressed herein.
